The recommended dietary hygiene measures for menopausal women are

* Avoidance of cardiovascular risk factors (tobacco, alcohol)
* Increasing energy expenditure: regular physical activity
* Moderate carbohydrate and fat energy intake.
* Adequate calcium and vitamin D intake: supplementation if necessary, particularly in cases of osteoporosis.

question.title: What is a recommended dietary measure for menopausal women?

option_a.title: Increasing protein intake
option_a.description: A common recommendation for menopausal women

option_b.title: Increasing carbohydrate and fat energy intake

option_c.title: Avoiding high-fiber intake
option_c.description: A potential concern for menopausal women

correct_option.title: D
